short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to manage all your urls in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create, manage and share your personal web URL's in just 2 clicks. Linktree lets you bundle and share urls, but Easylinks helps you manage your Linktree, LinkedIn, Instagram and any web url using an easy to use Chrome Extension. 

Use case: When someone ask for your LinkedIn or Insta profile url open your chrome extension and copy the url in less than a second. 

No more opening new tabs, typing in urls and then copy-pasta jobs. 

That's Easylinks for you!
